languages.text: {n}Культистка шагает вперед, делая прямой и резкий взмах рукой — не то перечеркивая фигуру Адальберта, не то рассекая невидимую нить.{/n} "Смерть прошептала твое имя, предавший клятвы. Суд Неумирающего ждет тебя".

{n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."
languages.original_text: {n}Культистка шагает вперед, делая прямой и резкий взмах рукой — не то перечеркивая фигуру Адальберта, не то рассекая невидимую нить.{/n} "Смерть прошептала твое имя, предавший клятвы. Суд Неумирающего ждет тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist takes a step forward and makes a straight and sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgment of the Undying One awaits you."

{n}The cultist takes a step forward and makes a straight and sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgment of the Undying One awaits you."

{n}The cultist takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgment of the Undying One awaits you."

{n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

{n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah tritt einen Schritt vor und macht eine gerade, scharfe Geste, als würde sie Adalberts Gestalt durchstreichen oder einen unsichtbaren Faden durchtrennen.{/n} "Der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert, Gelübdebrecher. Das Urteil des Todlosen erwartet Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah tritt einen Schritt vor und macht eine gerade, scharfe Geste, als würde sie Adalberts Gestalt durchstreichen oder einen unsichtbaren Faden durchtrennen.{/n} "Der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert, Gelübdebrecher. Das Urteil des Todlosen erwartet Euch."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah da un paso al frente y realiza un gesto amplio y brusco con la mano, como si cruzase la figura de Adalbert o cortase un hilo invisible.{/n} «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre, quebrantador de juramentos. El Inmortal espera para juzgarle».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah da un paso al frente y realiza un gesto amplio y brusco con la mano, como si cruzase la figura de Adalbert o cortase un hilo invisible.{/n} «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre, quebrantador de juramentos. El Inmortal espera para juzgarle».

languages.text: {n}キベラは一歩後ろに下がって、バッと掃くような仕草をする。まるでアダルバートの姿を切るような、見えない糸を断ち切るような仕草だ。{/n}「死があなたの名前を囁いた。不死の者の裁きが待っている」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは一歩後ろに下がって、バッと掃くような仕草をする。まるでアダルバートの姿を切るような、見えない糸を断ち切るような仕草だ。{/n}「死があなたの名前を囁いた。不死の者の裁きが待っている」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈向前迈了一步，做了个干净利落的横扫手势，仿佛切断了阿达伯特的身影，或是切断了一条看不见的丝线。{/n}“死亡在低声呼唤你的名字，背信弃义之人。不死之神的审判在等待着你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈向前迈了一步，做了个干净利落的横扫手势，仿佛切断了阿达伯特的身影，或是切断了一条看不见的丝线。{/n}“死亡在低声呼唤你的名字，背信弃义之人。不死之神的审判在等待着你。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah avance d'un pas et fait un geste ample et précis, comme pour rayer Adalbert de l'histoire ou trancher quelque fil invisible.{/n} « La mort a murmuré votre nom, parjure. Le jugement de l'Immortel vous attend. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah avance d'un pas et fait un geste ample et précis, comme pour rayer Adalbert de l'histoire ou trancher quelque fil invisible.{/n} « La mort a murmuré votre nom, parjure. Le jugement de l'Immortel vous attend. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ileri doğru bir adım atıyor ve düz, keskin hareketle elini Adalbert'in vücudunun önünden, görünmeyen bir ipliği kesermiş gibi geçiriyor.{/n} "Ölüm adını fısıldadı, yeminlerine ihanet eden varlık. Ölmeyen'in adaleti seni bekliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a step forward and makes a straight, sharp sweeping gesture, as if crossing Adalbert's figure or severing an invisible thread.{/n} "Death has whispered your name, betrayer of vows. The judgement of the Undying One awaits you."
